game.name: Infernal Descent
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Descend through the Nine Circles of Hell in a fast-paced action gauntlet inspired by Dante’s Inferno. Bullet Hell and Heaven, survive sin-twisted realms, and fight your way to Satan himself. Hell does not forgive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Descend through the Nine Circles of Hell in a fast-paced action gauntlet inspired by Dante’s Inferno. Bullet Hell and Heaven, survive sin-twisted realms, and fight your way to Satan himself. Hell does not forgive.
